FuncDef: This command associates a head-end location with a statically-defined segment routing policy. The head-end is an identification of the router which is the target to install the policy. This is a mandatory parameter for enabling the segment routing policy.

ParaDef.Info: Keyword indicating that the policy is intended to be used by the local router and not advertised to other BGP routers.
Specifies the head-end address of the (non-local) segment routing policy. Values-a.b.c.d.
